articles.description: Sir Simon Stevens said the second wave 'is real and it's serious' as he pointed to NHS data showing there are more than 11,000 coronavirus patients in hospitals in England
articles.content:
Hospitals are under pressure with more than 11,000 coronavirus patients on the wards, the NHS England boss has said.
Sir Simon Stevens warned that the second wave of the virus "is real and it's seri… [+2883 chars]
